metadata.synopsis: Naysa is a very grumpy tiefling with a heart of gold. She takes patrolling very seriously and doesn't appreciate being interrupted. This covers all the main states in Haven.

0.speaker: Harper Naysa
0.text: You need something, ask Jaheira. I'm on duty.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: Grumpy - focused on patrolling

1.speaker: Harper Naysa
1.text: My eyes can't be everywhere. Be careful who you choose to watch your back.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Gruff but concern for the player hidden underneath.

2.speaker: Harper Naysa
2.text: Get the hint, mate. I don't have time for a chat.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: Grumpy - focused on patrolling

3.speaker: Harper Naysa
3.text: Shadows on the outside, traitors on the inside... best steer clear of them Flaming Fists, all right?
3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: Gruff but concern for the player hidden underneath.
